text: @CNN I’m thinking that the # of legal or illegal immigrations have declined. Think about it, the US has the highest number of Covid19 cases. The WH and some Governor’s are ignoring the WHO recommendations. I’m sure Trump will find some way to claim that this way his plan all along!
